metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12166 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
OpenVPN versions before 2.3.3 and 2.4.x before 2.4.4 are vulnerable to abuffer overflow vulnerability when key-method 1 is used, possibly resultingin code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12166` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openvpn - 2.4.7-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openvpn package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.7-1ubuntu2').
